name: PiratesFanTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open pirates fan trivia”
”Alexa, start pirates fan trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pirates fan trivia
des:
Pirates baseball trivia was amassed by a long time avid fan of Major League Baseball. This skill is fun to play during the long winter months when there is no baseball and you long to hear “Play Ball”. Or before or after the game while at home or in the car.

Pirates baseball trivia is great for the entire family. Play by yourself or against others to see who really knows their Pirates.

New trivia is constantly being added to the skill so keep coming back and playing.


If you have questions, comments or a favorite trivia you want to see added to this game please let us know: skills@dwilsys.com.


This skill is not sponsored nor endorsed by Major League Baseball the Pittsburgh Pirates or its affiliates. This is a fan created game. All trademarks belong to the respective owners.
